data.title: Melissa and David Fumero Share Touching Tributes to Their ‚ÄòOne Life to Live‚Äô Co-Star, Kamar de los Reyes

The actor passed away on Christmas Eve at the age of 56 after a short battle with cancer. As we have previously posted, so many touching tributes have honored [‚Ä¶]
data.text:
Over the last 48 hours, remembrances have been pouring in on social media for the late Kamar de los Reyes (ex-Antonio Vega, One Life to Live). The actor passed away on Christmas Eve at the age of 56 after a short battle with cancer.

As we have previously posted, so many touching tributes have honored the life of de los Reyes and what he has meant to so many people, and what an extremely talented actor he was throughout his television and film career. At the time of his death, Kamar was taping new episodes for the sixth season of the CW‚Äôs All American, in his recurring role as Coach Montes.

Two stars who grew up with Kamar during his earlier years on ‚ÄòOne Life‚Äô were Melissa and David Fumero. The couple met while at the ABC soap opera, where she played Adriana Cramer and he played Cristian Vega. They have been married since 2007 and share two sons together. As for their beloved former castmate, Kamar also married his One Life to Live co-star, Sherri Saum (ex-Keri Reynolds) in 2007. The couple shared twin sons together. Taking to their Instagram accounts, Melissa and David reflected on the loss of their friend and former co-star.

Melissa Fumero, who rose to fame in Brooklyn Nine-Nine, beautifully said in her remembrance to Kamar: ‚ÄúYou took me to my first work event. It was a Latino event. From the very beginning you instilled in me the importance to show up for the community. To show up for your people. This goodbye is too hard. But I will pick myself up and believe and have hope and stay positive and laugh and love my loved ones hard and do my best to spread fuckin joy because that‚Äôs what you did everyday. We love you Kamar. We always will.‚Äù The actress included some very heart-tugging images along with her post illustrating the close bond she had with de Los Reyes (see below).

David Fumero who played Kamar‚Äôs on-screen brother, and went on to be featured in Starz Power, and other numerous primetime roles, expressed: ‚ÄúKamar De Los Reyes‚Ä¶Can‚Äôt say goodbye my friend. But thank you for your love and wisdom. For the many laughs that would brighten my days. You‚Äôre a legend and a warrior in my book. I will keep my ears open for your whispers that I know will come. Rest In Power‚Ä¶Till we meet again my brother! üí™üèΩüí™üèΩüí™üèΩ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüèΩüôèüèΩüôèüèΩ‚Äù

Fumero‚Äôs Instagram post included very poignant photos of both he and Kamar together and with others including: former WWE champion, Hulk Hogan and their One Life to Live on-screen mom, Patricia Maucieri (ex-Carlotta Vega).

You can check out the Melissa and David‚Äôs tributes to Kamar below.

What are you remembrances of Kamar, David and Melissa from One Life to Live? What did you think of these beautiful tributes to a man gone too soon? Share your thoughts in the comment section.

On Monday, during a press conference held by Los Angeles County prosecutors, two of the four suspects in the death of Johnny Wactor (ex-Brando Corbin) have now been officially charged with the murder of the beloved General Hospital actor.

The charges were announced by L.A. County District Attorney George Gasc√≥n and interim police chief Dominic Choi. The suspects charged with Wactor‚Äôs murder are Robert Barceleau and Sergio Estrada, both 18.

The most serious charge is for Barceleau, who was charged with murder, including a special circumstance allegation of killing in the commission of a robbery, which could lead to a life-without-parole prison term. He was also charged with attempted robbery and grand theft, both with allegations he was armed with a firearm.

Estrada, was also charged with murder, but without the special circumstance allegation. He was also charged with attempted robbery and grand theft, both also allegedly while armed with a firearm. Estrada is also facing a life sentence.

The two other suspects were also formally charged, Leonel Gutierrez, also 18 was charged with attempted robbery and grand theft by embezzlement, both with allegations he was armed. Meanwhile, Frank Olano, 22, was charged with being an accessory after the fact to the killing, along with receiving stolen property and three counts of being a felon in possession of a firearm. Barceleau, Estrada and Gutierrez remain in custody in lieu of $2 million bail each, while Olano must post a $1 million bail.

Wactor was killed May 25 in the early morning hours in downtown Los Angeles after his shift as a bartender at the Level 8 bar/restaurant. He, and co-worker, Anita Joy were walking to their cars, when Wactor came upon the thieves trying to steal the catalytic converter from his vehicle and was shot in the chest and died in Joy‚Äôs arms.

So, are you glad Johnny‚Äôs murderers have been officially charged? Share your thoughts via the comment section below. But first, you can check out the press conference from Fox 11 Los Angeles.

On Sunday, the world learned of the passing of veteran actor, John Aprea who died back on August 5th at the age of 83.

Aprea appeared on Another World in two roles throughout his career ‚Äì Lucas (Luke) Castigliano from 1989 to 1993, and Alexander Nikos from May 1997 to January 1998.

In story, Lucas was one of the loves of Felicia Gallant‚Äôs (Linda Dano) life. They shared a daughter that was put up for adoption when they were younger, who was later revealed to be Lorna Devon played by Alicia Coppola.

On Monday, August 19th, following the news of his death, both Linda and Alicia shared their remembrances of their time working with the talented actor.

Linda Dano took to her Instagram and expressed, ‚ÄúAs many of you already know my dear friend John Aprea passed away on August 5th‚Ä¶out of respect to his wife Betsy I waited until the family released there statement.. before I posted anything.This has been a very difficult time‚Ä¶I loved him so‚Ä¶The kindest sweetest funniest man.I believe he is now in Heaven with all of his old friends and of coarse ,my Frank‚Ä¶God has his hands full!!!Bless you John ‚Ä¶I miss you ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äù

Alicia Coppola shared on her Instagram: ‚ÄúNow I have two fathers in heaven. I adored you John Aprea. Mama Linda Dano and I will always miss you. You were there for me to grieve my very own daddy. Art imitated life. I loved you then. I love you now. Hope you, my daddy and Frankie are giving God a run for His money. With beer, blonds with big boobs. Xoxo‚Äù

Coppola appeared as Lorna from 1991-1994, while Linda Dan0 played Felicia from 1983-1999 and until AW‚Äôs final episode.

Do you remember Alicia, John and Linda‚Äôs scenes together from ‚ÄòAnother World‚Äô? Share your remembrances via the comment section below.

Keeping with their international reach and flair, CBS‚Äô The Bold and the Beautiful is bringing Iceland‚Äôs top rock star to the series in a special appearance.

J√∂kull J√∫liusson, who is the frontman of the band Kaleo, will tape his episode today at the B&B soundstages. In the story, J√∫liusson will play himself and perform his hit song, ‚ÄúWay Down We Go.‚Äù

Look for the episode featuring the musical performance to air on September 27th on the soap opera. According to Deadline, ‚ÄúJ√∫liusson was approached about making a cameo last year by a B&B producer while both were attending an Andrea Bocelli concert.‚Äù

As B&B viewers know, Andrea Bocelli performed on the soap in an episode that aired in June of 2023 when the show went to Rome, Italy for a remote.

Last week, Y&R‚Äôs Michael Damian performed his ‚ÄúRock On‚Äù Remix version in the living room at the Forrester Mansion when Danny and Christine (Lauralee Bell) dropped in to Los Angeles from Danny‚Äôs world tour.

The Bold and the Beautiful is no stranger to bringing other recording acts on to the show when Lil Nas X did a cameo as a waiter, Usher played the role of Raymond, and American Idol alum Constantine Maroulis played the role of Constantine Parros.

Meanwhile, while in Los Angeles, J√∫liusson will also appear on the Tuesday, August 20th episode of late night‚Äôs Jimmy Kimmel Live! and will perform a concert at The Troubadour on Wednesday night August 21st which is already sold out.

What do you think about J√∂kull J√∫liusson coming to The Bold and the Beautiful? Let us know in the comment section. And if you don‚Äôt know his music, watch the video for his song with Kaleo,‚ÄùWay Down We Go‚Äù below.
